Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Takes substring of characters 1 and 2. Validates substring and maps to CASFRI disturbance type. Valid strings must have two or four characters.

Takes substring of characters 3 and 4. Validates substring and maps to CASFRI disturbance type. For a second disturbance to be present dist_type_1 must have 4 characters. If one or two characters, return NOT_APPLICABLE because there is no second disturbance. If three characters, return INVALID_VALUE because disturbance code must have length 2.
If there is a dist_type_2 to report, year is UNKNOWN_VALUE, if there is no dist_type_2, return NOT_APPLICABLE
